pullrequest.title: reverting some of the performance changes to fix DropStuff test (lambda_erp will be computed everytime).

content.html:
diff -r e53015d879c9 test/regression/contact_sensor.cc
--- a/test/regression/contact_sensor.cc Wed May 22 12:46:08 2013 -0700
+++ b/test/regression/contact_sensor.cc Wed May 22 17:53:33 2013 -0700
@@ -320,6 +320,9 @@

   msgs::Contacts contacts;

+  physics->SetContactMaxCorrectingVel(0);
+  physics->SetSORPGSIters(100);
+
   world->StepWorld(1);

   // run simulation until contacts occur
